Comment: It‚Äôs Terry Pratchett‚Äôs birthday, so it‚Äôs fitting to mention his novel ‚ÄúThe Fifth Element.‚Äù As a sub plot, a perfectly inadequate sergeant suddenly finds himself in charge of the Discworld‚Äôs largest police force. He cracks under the pressure almost immediately and accuses everyone in the building of stealing his sugar cubes. People are punished and fired if he suspects them of sugar cube theft. In response to him also denying their pay, they form a union and go on strike. Turns out, the sergeant just keeps miscounting.  On Roundworld (our world) a perfectly inadequate reserve officer of a not particularly high rank, gets fired from multiple positions and then finds himself in charge of the world‚Äôs largest military. He cracks under the pressure almost immediately and begins accusing everyone of leaking information and punishes and fires quite a few people. Turns out, he was the leak all along.
